description: One of my favorite designs with a color scheme that I don't use very often, but turned out well. The banner holder at the top of the site fits the layout well, and it has a seperate area for link buttons. I designed the banner (1010clipart.com) in the banner slot of the cached version.
title: Clipart Giant

description: A quick interface designed for Ecyber Solutions' e-commerce site. I did not design the globes, I just worked the text onto them and changed the color of the globes for the mouse-over "highlight" effect.
title: Ecyber Solutions

description: This is an interface done for Highbrid Entertainment's website. It is a menu for each artist's webpage.
title: Highbrid Entertainment

description: This is a DJ oriented site that I made a funky layout for. The site/group colors they requested were lime green on black. The fonts give it a grunge type feel.
title: Highbrid Entertainment

description: A logo I made for the ngemu.com emulation site when they were doing a redesign. It was never submitted.
title: NGEmu - \'Coming Soon\'

description: A logo made for a friend's radio site. It wasn't ever used.
title: Stickman Radio

description: One of my amatuer designs, this was an attempt with a purple color scheme and some lightning effects. This group later merged with Highbrid Entertainment, which is another site I designed.
title: Strife Entertainment

description: This was a website for a futuristic online RPG game. The original website menu had mouse over effects that would work on the triangle menu (each button would light up). I later designed another section of this site, called "Threshold".
title: Takamo

description: Another futuristic looking webpage that was a part of the "Takamo" site I designed earlier. The menu is text based, so the client could easily change it if he needed to.
title: Threshold

description: A large entrance image for the Highbrid Entertainment website. The Shape of the "H" was someone else's design; I created the graphical logo effects.
title: Highbrid Entertainment

description: Simple laserpointer site with a metal wire-frame layout. One of my earliest designs for a commercial site.
title: Lasterpointer.net

description: Another early and simple layout designed around the logo I made for this site. And yes, the title is spelled correctly.
title: Finewatchs.net

description: This is a layout done for one of my personal sites. It was laid out to be fast and able to handle large amounts of content generated with CGI and a database.
title: Philisoft PC Game Zone

description: This is a revision of my original PC Game Zone site. It was made to handle content better and to be used without frames.
title: Philisoft PC Game Zone (2nd revision)

description: This was a layout for another of my personal sites, meant to be a repository for Macromedia Flash designs and tutorials.
title: Philisoft Flash Zone

description: An incredibly fast loading site with mostly HTML graphics and one large graphical header. This layout had a lot of room for additional content and expandable sections, as requested.
title: Techspot.net

description: A fast and simple site for mostly informational pages.
title: Microton Online Media

description: A cool aqua on black layout with a blue fire look on the logo and menus. This layout was never used.
title: 123MP3

description: An interesting piecemeal design for a "top list" site, which listed the top clipart sites.
title: 1010clipart.com

description: MP3 logo for a light blue and black layout. I liked the use of black lettering on a black background, because it transitions well and is still readable.
title: Abstract MP3\'s

description: Very quick logo for a friend's MP3 site. The lack of color makes this logo one of my least favorites.
title: AudioRock MP3\'s

description: One of my earliest commercial logos, and one of my favorites. The font fit the theme and style of the site very well.
title: Finewatchs.net

description: Logo for an online car audio sales / installation website. I designed the interface for this site as well, and it had a really good graphical look and color scheme to it.
title: Kick\'n Car Audio

description: Early logo for a laserpointer site. After this logo design, I later made the rest of the website.
title: Laserpointer.net

description: A logo for a friend's gaming site. I didn't draw the character's pictures, I just used them.
title: Street Fighter Battleground

description: An very fun and comical looking logo - it has a zebra theme while being colorful and artistic at the same time. One of my favorites.
title: Zebra Joes.com

description: Logo required to implement a photo of the product. The colors had to match a sky pattern that the rest of the site uses. Turned out well.
title: Corrview Footer

description: Logo with sunburst theme, and matching "sky" colors to link up with the rest of the site.
title: Corrview Logo

description: A personal site of mine based on emulation. This was to have a technical and "video-game" look to it, being colorful and active. I implemented animated images into the layout, which gets very annoying after awhile (one reason why this layout was replaced by revision 2).
title: Next Gen Emu (Version 1)

description: One of my favorite color schemes (purple and black) used in a very hip metallic layout, that is clean and creative at the same time. The background is a large transparent gray image that stays in a fixed location while the page scrolls.
title: Next Gen Emu (Version 2)
